Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson faced a tough matchup against Angels flamethrower Ben Joyce with the Tigers' six-game winning streak on the line.
Torkelson struck out against Joyce's mid-90s sinker, which acts like a changeup.
Post-Match Reflections: Torkelson acknowledged missing a good pitch to hit and praised Joyce's pitching.
Manager A.J. Hinch commented on the difficulty of facing Joyce's combination of high velocity and offspeed pitches.
